title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Beef Stir Fry
summary: Quick Asian-style stir fry with tender beef strips and colorful vegetables.

title: Avocado Toast

summary: Savory fried rice tossed with shrimp, eggs, peas, and soy sauce.

title: Vegetable Soup
summary: A warm and hearty blend of vegetables simmered in a light broth.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy golden pancakes perfect with honey, syrup, or berries.
